metadata.title: CVE-2019-11089 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: Insufficient input validation in Kernel Mode module for Intel(R) GraphicsDriver before version 25.20.100.6519 may allow an authenticated user topotentially enable denial of service via local access.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
